name: AaveV2Proxy
description: AaveV2Proxy Contract. An Aave V2 proxy contract that allows the proxyOwner to interact with a given Aave lending pool contract. Currently, this only works with a single Aave market per proxy. Proxy owners can deposit, borrow, repay and delegate, all without ever having to receive aTokens directly to their wallet.

functionDecorators.name: transferProxyOwner
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the proxy proxyOwner to a given address, granting them control over all of the proxy's assets.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new address to transfer the proxy to. NOTE: If you're transferring without the factory, be certain whatever address you're transferring to can interface with this proxy if it's a contract.
